reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater to be of great quality and appreciate its fit. The appearance receives mixed reactions, with some describing it as chic. Several customers report sizing issues, finding it too small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality | size up if you do not want form fitting
items.body: Fabric was actually high quality for the price. Sizing was slightly smaller, it is a very form fitted turtleneck…. So if you would like to have it, not as snug, I would definitely recommend sizing up. Overall, it was a great sweater to dress up a ski trip. Read more
items.author: RJH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a nice fitting, feeling, and warm sweater
items.body: I love this sweater it fits like the model in the stock photos, what you see is what you get here- I'm going to order the black one now. Read more
items.author: just me..

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable!
items.body: Looks way more expensive than it is. I wore this with a pair of black ponte leggings, black Chelsea boots, and a longer black down vest while traveling on a long flight during the Thanksgiving holiday. It was the perfect outfit: chic and comfortable. I looked as good when I arrived as when I departed. Also got numerous compliments on the outfit. Read more
items.author: Midwest Girl

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Size of the neck
items.body: Returned due to neck portion of the shirt Read more
items.author: Michele Miller

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Quality
items.body: I moved from Colorado to Arizona and wanted something fun to remember my ski days. This sweater was superior quality, soft and fit so well. However, I decided I would probably never get to wear it as it is 75-80 degrees here at Christmas. I returned it, but if you live in cold weather- buy it. You will enjoy it!!! Read more
items.author: AZLA2

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great ski sweater
items.body: I received so many compliments on my recent ski trip. The sweater was perfect, comfortable with a great fit too! Read more
items.author: Tara M. Ingram

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: I like the sweater but a medium is NOT a US medium. So order up Read more
items.author: Shannon OConnor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal!
items.body: I really wanted something fun like this so I can remember my times in the Alps but I didn’t want to pay $200-300 for something I wear for a few weeks a year. This did the trick! Perfect. I am 5’2 115 and the small fit great. It’s not too tight nor too baggy—very flattering. Sharp looking. Read more
items.author: Regina

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, White, 02-army Green, Blue, 03-navy Blue, 01-black, 04-khaqi, White-red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
